actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that such act shall not apply to employers, including farming operations, having 25 or fewer employees.

summary.text: Excludes employers with less than 25 employees during any consecutive six-month period in the most recent fiscal year from coverage under the Occupational Safety and Health Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide that such act shall not apply to employers, including farming operations, having 25 or fewer employees.
